text:
@senatemajldr MoscowMitch's 'Heals Act’ Covid-19 Bill DOES NOT INCLUDE:  Funds for food assistance for children OR payroll cuts to help increase wages.
Plus, you can't sue businesses, schools, hospitals for covid-19 related damage for 5 YEARS. So if someone puts your life in danger--too bad!
